verses.text: Now these \add are\add* the \w nations|strong="H1471"\w* which the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w left|strong="H3240"\w*, to \w prove|strong="H5254"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* by them, \add even\add* as many \add of Israel\add* as had not \w known|strong="H3045"\w* all the \w wars|strong="H4421"\w* of \w Canaan|strong="H3667"\w*;

Only \w that|strong="H7535"\w* the \w generations|strong="H1755"\w* of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* might \w know|strong="H3045"\w*, to \w teach|strong="H3925"\w* them \w war|strong="H4421"\w*, at the least such as \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w knew|strong="H3045"\w* nothing thereof;

\add Namely\add*, \w five|strong="H2568"\w* \w lords|strong="H5633"\w* of the \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w*, and all the \w Canaanites|strong="H3669"\w*, and the \w Sidonians|strong="H6722"\w*, and the \w Hivites|strong="H2340"\w* that \w dwelt|strong="H3427"\w* in \w mount|strong="H2022"\w* \w Lebanon|strong="H3844"\w*, from \w mount|strong="H2022"\w* \w Baal-hermon|strong="H1179"\w* unto the entering \w in|strong="H0935"\w* of \w Hamath|strong="H2574"\w*.

And they were to \w prove|strong="H5254"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* by them, to \w know|strong="H3045"\w* whether they would \w hearken|strong="H8085"\w* unto the \w commandments|strong="H4687"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, which he \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* their \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w* by the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*.

¶ And the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w dwelt|strong="H3427"\w* \w among|strong="H7130"\w* the \w Canaanites|strong="H3669"\w*, \w Hittites|strong="H2850"\w*, and \w Amorites|strong="H0567"\w*, and \w Perizzites|strong="H6522"\w*, and \w Hivites|strong="H2340"\w*, and \w Jebusites|strong="H2983"\w*:

And they \w took|strong="H3947"\w* their \w daughters|strong="H1323"\w* to be their \w wives|strong="H0802"\w*, and \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* their \w daughters|strong="H1323"\w* to their \w sons|strong="H1121"\w*, and \w served|strong="H5647"\w* their \w gods|strong="H0430"\w*.

And the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w did|strong="H6213"\w* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* in the \w sight|strong="H5869"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, and \w forgat|strong="H7911"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* their \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, and \w served|strong="H5647"\w* \w Baalim|strong="H1168"\w* and the \w groves|strong="H0842"\w*.

¶ Therefore the \w anger|strong="H0639"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* was \w hot|strong="H2734"\w* against \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, and he \w sold|strong="H4376"\w* them into the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of \w Chushan-rishathaim|strong="H3573"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Mesopotamia|strong="H0763"\w*: and the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w served|strong="H5647"\w* \w Chushan-rishathaim|strong="H3573"\w* \w eight|strong="H8083"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w*.\f + \fr 3.8 \ft Mesopotamia: Heb. Aram-naharaim\f*

And when the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w cried|strong="H2199"\w* unto the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* raised \w up|strong="H6965"\w* a \w deliverer|strong="H3467"\w* to the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, who \w delivered|strong="H3467"\w* them, \add even\add* \w Othniel|strong="H6274"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Kenaz|strong="H7073"\w*, \w Caleb’s|strong="H3612"\w* \w younger|strong="H6996"\w* \w brother|strong="H0251"\w*.  +  r 3.9  t deliverer: Heb. saviour *

And the \w Spirit|strong="H7307"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* came upon him, and he \w judged|strong="H8199"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, and went \w out|strong="H3318"\w* to \w war|strong="H4421"\w*: and the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w delivered|strong="H5414"\w* \w Chushan-rishathaim|strong="H3573"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Mesopotamia|strong="H0763"\w* into his \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*; and his \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w prevailed|strong="H5810"\w* against \w Chushan-rishathaim|strong="H3573"\w*.  +  r 3.10  t came: Heb. was *  +  r 3.10  t Mesopotamia: Heb. Aram *

And the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* had \w rest|strong="H8252"\w* \w forty|strong="H0705"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w*. And \w Othniel|strong="H6274"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Kenaz|strong="H7073"\w* \w died|strong="H4191"\w*.

¶ And the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w did|strong="H6213"\w* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* \w again|strong="H3254"\w* in the \w sight|strong="H5869"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*: and the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w strengthened|strong="H2388"\w* \w Eglon|strong="H5700"\w* the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Moab|strong="H4124"\w* against \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, because they had \w done|strong="H6213"\w* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* in the \w sight|strong="H5869"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*.

And he \w gathered|strong="H0622"\w* unto him the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Ammon|strong="H5983"\w* and \w Amalek|strong="H6002"\w*, and \w went|strong="H3212"\w* and \w smote|strong="H5221"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, and \w possessed|strong="H3423"\w* the \w city|strong="H5892"\w* of palm \w trees|strong="H8558"\w*.

So the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w served|strong="H5647"\w* \w Eglon|strong="H5700"\w* the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Moab|strong="H4124"\w* \w eighteen|strong="H8083"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w*.

But when the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w cried|strong="H2199"\w* unto the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* raised them \w up|strong="H6965"\w* a \w deliverer|strong="H3467"\w*, \w Ehud|strong="H0164"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Gera|strong="H1617"\w*, a \w Benjamite|strong="H1145"\w*, a \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w lefthanded|strong="H0334"\w*: and by \w him|strong="H3027"\w* the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* a \w present|strong="H4503"\w* unto \w Eglon|strong="H5700"\w* the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Moab|strong="H4124"\w*.  +  r 3.15  t a Benjamite: or, the son of Jemini *  +  r 3.15  t lefthanded: Heb. shut of his right hand *

But \w Ehud|strong="H0164"\w* \w made|strong="H6213"\w* him a \w dagger|strong="H2719"\w* which had \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w edges|strong="H6366"\w*, of a \w cubit|strong="H1574"\w* \w length|strong="H0753"\w*; and he did \w gird|strong="H2296"\w* it under his \w raiment|strong="H4055"\w* upon his \w right|strong="H3225"\w* \w thigh|strong="H3409"\w*.

And he \w brought|strong="H7126"\w* the \w present|strong="H4503"\w* unto \w Eglon|strong="H5700"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Moab|strong="H4124"\w*: and \w Eglon|strong="H5700"\w* \add was\add* a \w very|strong="H3966"\w* \w fat|strong="H1277"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w*.

And when he had made an \w end|strong="H3615"\w* to \w offer|strong="H7126"\w* the \w present|strong="H4503"\w*, he sent \w away|strong="H7971"\w* the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* that \w bare|strong="H5375"\w* the \w present|strong="H4503"\w*.

But he himself turned \w again|strong="H7725"\w* from the \w quarries|strong="H6456"\w* that \add were\add* by \w Gilgal|strong="H1537"\w*, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, I have a \w secret|strong="H5643"\w* \w errand|strong="H1697"\w* unto thee, O \w king|strong="H4428"\w*: who \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, Keep \w silence|strong="H2013"\w*. And all that \w stood|strong="H5975"\w* by him went \w out|strong="H3318"\w* from him.\f + \fr 3.19 \ft quarries: or, graven images\f*

And \w Ehud|strong="H0164"\w* \w came|strong="H0935"\w* unto him; and he was \w sitting|strong="H3427"\w* in a \w summer|strong="H4747"\w* \w parlour|strong="H5944"\w*, which he had for himself alone. And \w Ehud|strong="H0164"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, I have a \w message|strong="H1697"\w* from \w God|strong="H0430"\w* unto thee. And he \w arose|strong="H6965"\w* out of \add his\add* \w seat|strong="H3678"\w*.\f + \fr 3.20 \ft a summer…: Heb. a parlour of cooling\f*

And \w Ehud|strong="H0164"\w* put \w forth|strong="H7971"\w* his \w left|strong="H8040"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*, and \w took|strong="H3947"\w* the \w dagger|strong="H2719"\w* from his \w right|strong="H3225"\w* \w thigh|strong="H3409"\w*, and \w thrust|strong="H8628"\w* it into his \w belly|strong="H0990"\w*:

And the \w haft|strong="H5325"\w* also went \w in|strong="H0935"\w* \w after|strong="H0310"\w* the \w blade|strong="H3851"\w*; and the \w fat|strong="H2459"\w* \w closed|strong="H5462"\w* \w upon|strong="H1157"\w* the \w blade|strong="H3851"\w*, so that he could not \w draw|strong="H8025"\w* the \w dagger|strong="H2719"\w* out of his \w belly|strong="H0990"\w*; and the \w dirt|strong="H6574"\w* came \w out|strong="H3318"\w*.\f + \fr 3.22 \ft the dirt…: or, it came out at the buttocks\f*

Then \w Ehud|strong="H0164"\w* went \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* through the \w porch|strong="H4528"\w*, and \w shut|strong="H5462"\w* the \w doors|strong="H1817"\w* of the \w parlour|strong="H5944"\w* upon him, and \w locked|strong="H5274"\w* them.

When he was gone \w out|strong="H3318"\w*, his \w servants|strong="H5650"\w* \w came|strong="H0935"\w*; and when they \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* that, behold, the \w doors|strong="H1817"\w* of the \w parlour|strong="H5944"\w* \add were\add* \w locked|strong="H5274"\w*, they \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, Surely he \w covereth|strong="H5526"\w* his \w feet|strong="H7272"\w* in his \w summer|strong="H4747"\w* \w chamber|strong="H2315"\w*.\f + \fr 3.24 \ft covereth…: or, doeth his easement\f*

And they \w tarried|strong="H2342"\w* till they were \w ashamed|strong="H0954"\w*: and, behold, he \w opened|strong="H6605"\w* not the \w doors|strong="H1817"\w* of the \w parlour|strong="H5944"\w*; therefore they \w took|strong="H3947"\w* a \w key|strong="H4668"\w*, and \w opened|strong="H6605"\w* \add them:\add* and, behold, their \w lord|strong="H0113"\w* \add was\add* fallen \w down|strong="H5307"\w* \w dead|strong="H4191"\w* on the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*.

And \w Ehud|strong="H0164"\w* \w escaped|strong="H4422"\w* while they \w tarried|strong="H4102"\w*, and passed \w beyond|strong="H5674"\w* the \w quarries|strong="H6456"\w*, and \w escaped|strong="H4422"\w* unto \w Seirath|strong="H8167"\w*.

And it came to pass, when he was \w come|strong="H0935"\w*, that he \w blew|strong="H8628"\w* a \w trumpet|strong="H7782"\w* in the \w mountain|strong="H2022"\w* of \w Ephraim|strong="H0669"\w*, and the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* went \w down|strong="H3381"\w* with him from the \w mount|strong="H2022"\w*, and he \w before|strong="H6440"\w* them.

And he \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto them, \w Follow|strong="H7291"\w* \w after|strong="H0310"\w* me: for the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* hath \w delivered|strong="H5414"\w* your \w enemies|strong="H0341"\w* the \w Moabites|strong="H4124"\w* into your \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*. And they went \w down|strong="H3381"\w* \w after|strong="H0310"\w* him, and \w took|strong="H3920"\w* the \w fords|strong="H4569"\w* of \w Jordan|strong="H3383"\w* toward \w Moab|strong="H4124"\w*, and \w suffered|strong="H5414"\w* not a \w man|strong="H0376"\w* to pass \w over|strong="H5674"\w*.

And they \w slew|strong="H5221"\w* of \w Moab|strong="H4124"\w* at that \w time|strong="H6256"\w* about \w ten|strong="H6235"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* \w men|strong="H0376"\w*, all \w lusty|strong="H8082"\w*, and all \w men|strong="H0376"\w* of \w valour|strong="H2428"\w*; and there \w escaped|strong="H4422"\w* not a \w man|strong="H0376"\w*.\f + \fr 3.29 \ft lusty: Heb. fat\f*

So \w Moab|strong="H4124"\w* was \w subdued|strong="H3665"\w* that \w day|strong="H3117"\w* under the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*. And the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* had \w rest|strong="H8252"\w* \w fourscore|strong="H8084"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w*.

¶ And \w after|strong="H0310"\w* him was \w Shamgar|strong="H8044"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Anath|strong="H6067"\w*, which \w slew|strong="H5221"\w* of the \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w* \w six|strong="H8337"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \w men|strong="H0376"\w* with an \w ox|strong="H1241"\w* \w goad|strong="H4451"\w*: and he also \w delivered|strong="H3467"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.
